# Minimum Requirements  

```{r Minimum Requirements, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}

mr_keys=get_unique_keys(params$pipeline$min_requirements)

for (mr_element in mr_keys) {
    new_mr_element_name = camel(mr_element)
    cat(paste('**', new_mr_element_name, '**: ', params$pipeline$min_requirements[[mr_element]], sep=''), sep = '\n')
    cat('\n')
}
```
